question:
The text is for questions 20 to 21 *    a.Javanese Hawk.

b.Wonosadi Forest.

c.The writer’s cousin.

d.A hike in the forest

21.	“We sat down and relaxed under the shades of four gigantic and ancient trees.”The underlined word is closest in meaning to … . *


a.very big

b.very small

c.very old

d.very young

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

Semoga terbantu✌

A:the writer’s trip to Yogyakarta    B:the writer’s first visit to Prambanan

D:the writer’s impression about Borobudur

15.	What is the purpose of the text above? *

A:to inform about Yogyakarta

B:to inform about Hotel in Yogyakarta

C:to tell beautiful place in Yogyakarta

D:to tell the writer’s experience in Yogyakarta

16. We arrived there at 3 pm (paragraph 3)The underline word is refers to . . . . *


A:Yogya Kraton

B:friendly guide

C:Borobudur temple

D:Jakarta

17. When did they go home? *


A:on Friday evening

B:on Friday afternoon

C:on Saturday morning

D:on Friday morning

18. Why did they only visit Brahmana and Syiwa temples? *


A:because there was no Wisnu temple

B:because Wisnu temple was to small

C:because Wisnu temple was being repaire

D:because Wisnu temple was being destroyed
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. A

15. A

16. C

17. B

18. C

Penjelasan:

maaf kalau salah :v

D:to tell the writer’s experience in Yogyakarta

related_questions.question:
A rabbit .... a.eats carrots and give wool    b.eats carrots and give milk
c.eats grass and gives wool 
d.eats carrot and gives meat 
tolong dijawaba​

There____some cute cats on the sofa a. Am b. is c. are d. does
secepatnya ya​

answers.answer:
there are some cute cats on the sofa

Penjelasan:

c) are

====================================

C. Are

Pembahasan

Untuk benda yang hanya ada 1 atau tunggal kita menggunakan "There is" , Sedangkan benda yang lebih dari 1 atau jamak maka kita menggunakan "There are".

Maka di pertanyaan tersebut kita menggunakan "There are". Karena ada beberapa hewan atau pada teks tersebut dijelaskan "some cute cats on the sofa" yang artinya beberapa kucing lucu di sofa.

====================================
